price: Zannediyorlar mı ki kendilerine mal ve oğullar sunduk diye?
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
